question: Olivia receives 70 emails a day. 20% of those emails don't require any response. He responds to the rest of them. How many emails does Olivia respond to in a 7 day work week?
answer:
Olivia receives 70*20/100=<<70*20/100=14>>14 emails that don't require a response
So he responds to 70-14=<<70-14=56>>56 emails per day
In a 7 day work week, Olivia responds to 56*7=<<56*7=392>> 392 emails
#### 392
